title: Movie Ticket Booking System
description: A console-based Java application mimicking BookMyShow, allowing users to select theatres, shows, and seats with a layered architecture for robust ticket booking.
features: Layered architecture with models (Movie, Theatre, Show, Booking), services, and controllers
User-driven theatre and show selection with seat booking
Enum-based city and seat category management
Maven for dependency management and build automation

title: Parallel Merge Sort Implementation
description: A Java application comparing parallel and sequential Merge Sort algorithms, using multi-threading to optimize performance on large datasets.
features: Modular design with separate packages for sorters, utilities, and app logic
Performance comparison mode for parallel vs. sequential execution

title: Try-Your-Gyan
description: A full-stack quiz platform with AI-generated quizzes, real-time participation, user authentication, and quiz sharing via unique links.
features: AI-powered quiz generation based on user topics
Real-time quiz participation and result tracking
User profile customization and quiz history

title: Social Media Application
description: A full-stack MERN social media platform with real-time notifications, post creation, commenting, and user authentication.
features: Text and image post creation with commenting
Post saving and user profile management
Optimized backend APIs for data handling
